scripts.build: vue-cli-service build && cd cordova_app && cordova build
scripts.ios: vue-cli-service build && cd cordova_app && cordova run ios
scripts.ios-device: vue-cli-service build && cd cordova_app && cordova run ios --device
scripts.browser: vue-cli-service build && cd cordova_app && cordova run browser --port=8200
scripts.android-build: vue-cli-service build && cd cordova_app && cordova build android --release
scripts.android-device: vue-cli-service build && cd cordova_app && cordova run android --device
scripts.android: vue-cli-service build && cd cordova_app && cordova run android
